name: Galactic Siege
description:
In a quest to finding a missing cargo ship, a galactic officer was assigned to a mission to search for the missing artifacts that were being transported to a secret facility. The galactic officer was traveling to the last coordinates of the ship’s last location. During his journey, he stumbled across a planet that might give him a clue about that whereabouts of the cargo ship. The planet was surrounded by volcanoes, magma, and igneous rocks. While the officer was exploring the area, he spotted a few scraps of metal from what seems like a cargo ship. On his way towards the material, he senses the presence of someone or something following him. In fear for his life, he tries to run towards the spaceship. During his retreat, he tripped over a few rocks that resulted in him to land on his weapon. His weapon was is malfunctioning. However, it was too late. The area was inhabited by aliens. His new mission is to survive the devastated siege of aliens that threatens his life.

 

[Objective]

            In a mission to survival, help the galactic officer stay alive from the siege of creatures with the help of his drone companion.
